What's the issue?
You're seeing other users' data (shopping lists, calendar events) because your browser cached API responses before the user isolation fix was applied.
The Solution
Click the button below to clear all cached data and reload with proper user isolation.
Manual Method (if button doesn't work)
1. Press F12 to open DevTools
2. Go to Console tab
3. Type: localStorage.clear()
4. Type: sessionStorage.clear()
5. Type: location.reload(true)
Verify It's Working
After clearing cache, check the browser console on lists.html or calendar.html:
